name: suppressor
description: A suppressor reduces the amount of noise and muzzle flash generated by the report of a firearm.  Gunfire is extremely loud and can damage your hearing without protection; a suppressor will bring the loudness of a report down to generally safe levels.  A suppressor will slightly reduce recoil and muzzle velocity.

name: shotgun suppressor
description: A supressor designed to work with shotguns.  It's a lot more complex than a suppressor for a pistol or rifle.

name: ported barrel
description: A ported barrel redirects exhaust gases to compensate for muzzle climb, improves recoil but increases noise and reduces accuracy slightly.

name: muzzle brake
description: A muzzle brake redirects exhaust gases to compensate for muzzle climb, improving recoil but increasing bulk, noise, and reducing accuracy slightly.
